resources.string: Here are the terms and condition for this regisration form:Abusive users — Terms and conditions allow you to establish what constitutes appropriate activity on your site or app, so you can remove abusive users and content that violates your guidelines. Intellectual property theft — Asserting your claim to the creative assets of your site in your terms and conditions will prevent ownership disputes and copyright infringement. Potential litigation — If a user lodges a legal complaint against your business, showing that they were presented with clear terms and conditions before they used your site will help you immensely in court. If you accept our terms and condition please click on the button Save, otherwise please exit our app. Thank You
